channel.title: Growth on gself
channel.description: Recent content in Growth on gself

item.title: Top and Bottom Growth Occupations
item.description: I’m continuing my exploration of EMSI occupational data and wanted to share another tidbit, the top and bottom occupations for Cochise County by the growth in job postings between 2013 and 2017. For example, “Grounds Maintenance Workers” had 328 job postings in 2013 and 456 in 2017 for an increase of 39%. Here are the top growth jobs (sorted by the percent change in postings). {"
